name: Today, I Am a Clown
writer: Matt Groening (created by), James L. Brooks (developed by), Matt Groening (developed by), Sam Simon (developed by), Joel H. Cohen, Daniel Chun (staff writer)
actors: Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright, Yeardley Smith
plot: Krusty decides to do what he never did when he was thirteen years old - have a Bar Mitzvah.
